title: A Prospective Study of Respiratory Viral Infection in Pregnant Women With and Without Asthma
text: Prevention of respiratory viral infections may improve asthma outcomes during pregnancy
authors: Murphy, Vanessa E.; Powell, Heather; Wark, Peter A.B.; Gibson, Peter G.

title: Respiratory disease in pregnancy
text:
Respiratory diseases complicated by pulmonary hypertension and cor pulmonale have a poor prognosis in pregnancy
 Coexisting maternal disease, including asthma and anaemia, and immunosuppressive therapy increase the risk of contracting pneumonia
